scripts.build:research: VITE_APP=ux-research vite build && cp ./netlify.toml ./ux-research/dist/netlify.toml && rm -rf ./docs/ -r "recursive" -f "force" && mkdir ./docs/ && cp -R ./ux-research/dist/ ./docs/
scripts.build:metrics: VITE_APP=ux-metrics vite build  && cp ./netlify.toml ./ux-metrics/dist/netlify.toml && rm -rf ./docs/ -r "recursive" -f "force" && mkdir ./docs/ && cp -R ./ux-metrics/dist/ ./docs/
scripts.build:visions: VITE_APP=ux-visions vite build  && cp ./netlify.toml ./ux-visions/dist/netlify.toml && rm -rf ./docs/ -r "recursive" -f "force" && mkdir ./docs/ && cp -R ./ux-visions/dist/ ./docs/
scripts.build:win: VITE_APP=win-stakeholders vite build  && cp ./netlify.toml ./win-stakeholders/dist/netlify.toml && rm -rf ./docs/ -r "recursive" -f "force" && mkdir ./docs/ && cp -R ./win-stakeholders/dist/ ./docs/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:research && npm run build:metrics && npm run build:visions && npm run build:win
